GameModel

Class Attribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameModel.Attribute
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attack

    public class Attribute
extends java.lang.Object
    An attribute stores a value that has limits. Its value can be evaluated in relation to its limits.
